title: URF 2019 (Riot please read)
body:
Basically I was wondering if it was possible to make the urf gamemode or rotating gamemodes in general possible to be played in customs often me and my friends are in a group more than 5 but really want to enjoy the urf experience together instead of having to queue in separate lobbies. I was just wondering if you could make it so we could make urf possible to be played in customs and if not let me know why. If you could make it possible to be played in customs before it leaves it would be greatly appreciated
Thank you.
